name: DeviceBee Technologies
tagline: Innovative Mobile Apps and Technology solutions
description:
DeviceBee Technologies is an innovative Mobile Apps Development agency helping startup founders and enterprise innovate with better web and mobile experiences. 
With offices on three continents, we have distributed agile players in Dubai, Lahore, San Francisco, and Kuwait. We help our clients realize the potential of rapidly evolving mobile technologies, from developing a mobile strategy to launching mobile products. Our unique team permits us to address our clients concerns at the highest strategic level while ensuring that all recommendations are presented in the context of real-world build costs and timelines. 
Service Offerings
Product Strategy
Prototyping & Concept Development
Product Design
iOS App Development
Android App Development
Web App Development
Chat Bot and Conversational Interface Development
Quality Assurance & Testing
Mobile Backend Engineering
iOT & Beacons Development
App Analytics and Marketing
UI/UX Design
Software Testing
